name: Kallikantzaros
description: A small, chaotic evil fey creature with agility and stealth, wearing hide armor.
memorable: Its ability to use the Misery Whip attack with another Kallikantzaros makes it a formidable combatant.
goals: To cause mischief and ambush unsuspecting foes.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fey creatures or mischievous entities.
strengths: Good at stealth, can evade attacks easily with Nimble Escape, and resistant to charm effects.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to incense and burning materials, struggles against strategic opponents due to low Intelligence.
attacks: Can make two handsaw or spear attacks in one turn, with enhanced effectiveness against unarmored targets.
most_powerful_ability: The Misery Whip allows it to strike multiple foes simultaneously and potentially knock them prone.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, aiding its stealth.
skills: Proficient in stealth with a +3 modifier.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed due to Fey Ancestry.
Cannot be put to sleep by magic.
Must succeed on a Constitution saving throw when near burning incense.
Mobile and can use Disengage or Hide as a bonus action.
The Handsaw attack is particularly dangerous against unarmored targets.
test_queries: chaotic small fey creature with stealth
mischievous creature that thrives in shadows
fey with special attack Misery Whip
stealthy monster resistant to charm spells
